name: Display graph according to the selected Timespan
description: Verify that the load statistics graph is displayed according to the selected timespan.
descriptionHtml: Verify that the load statistics graph is displayed according to the selected timespan.

beforeStages.name: Set up config from context for test session.
Clear Jenkins data before each test run.

steps.name: Clean up Jenkins data.
Delete all existing jobs and views for the user session.
Extract Jenkins crumb token from HTML response.

parameters.name: config
parameters.value: Config(browser=BrowserConfig(NAME='chrome', OPTIONS_CHROME='--remote-allow-origins=*;--disable-gpu;--no-sandbox;--disable-dev-shm-usage;--headless=new;--window-size=1920,1080', OPTIONS_EDGE='--window-size=1920,1080'), jenkins=JenkinsConfig(HOST='localhost', PORT='8080', USERNAME='admin', PASSWORD='e322e7761c10457ebc1f72a3431a133a', base_url='http://localhost:8080', login_url='http://localhost:8080/j_spring_security_check', login_data={'j_username': 'admin', 'j_password': 'e322e7761c10457ebc1f72a3431a133a'}, crumb='d821a925fb9350fa23206f715095cba274980c22ddb1ea623e8bbb8d30610ac3', current_username=''))
